column1: The clothes are well attended, and a lot of products of very good quality as well as good prices.
Terrible service. I'm coming out of a fracture and I can't stand for a long time! The supervisor Alex sent me to form in a great line! what a lack of criteria... great discrimination!

I'm the one who buys shoes today, but you said... they didn't accept my debit card, but they already charged me. and I asked the bank that they said that you did not refund... so I'm still pending until now
nice selection. great prices. found some good deals.
all current in fashion, affordable prices, diversity of sizes and above all clothing ordered by size.
please be respectful to people. Open at the time their signs say. Not even to leave our money? really? People also have things to do.
